A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
While the film is visually stunning\, it takes more than money to make a good movie.

Some movies get better the more you think about the movie once you leave the cinema\, other movies just get worse as you recall the plot holes and inexplicably bad writing that resulted in familiar characters doing uncharacteristic things.

Star Wars: The Last Jedi is definitely one of the latter kind of movies.
